name: The Gift
description:
"The Gift" is a horror point and click game. You play as a hotel administrator, who will have to unwittingly face forces inaccessible to human consciousness. This story of loss, retribution, and unholy union begins with the appearance of a mysterious stranger. The creators of this game were inspired by such films as "The Raven" and "The Midnight Meat Train". To move along the plot, the player will have to solve puzzles for attentiveness and find letters left by a stranger. Control of the game is carried out by using the mouse and the "Space" and "Tab" keys. There are no saves and checkpoints in this game, but there is a choice of difficulty level.
If you have any problems during the passage, you can refer to the manual file "The-Gift-Hints".
